             <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-photography " id="post-693472">
              <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-photography" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/12/vivid-sydney-festival-4k-timelapse/">
               <picture class="img-responsive first">

                </source>
                <!--[if IE 8 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/vividsydney-0-440x285.jpg" alt="Vivid Sydney Festival 4K Timelapse"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->

            <li>
             <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-design " id="post-694493">
              <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-design" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/11/batman-in-wood/">
               <picture class="img-responsive first">
                <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/batmaninwood-3-440x285.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">
                </source>

                </source>

             <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-pop-culture " id="post-670703">
              <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-pop-culture" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/06/30/best-of-creative-plant-jars-on-fubiz/">
               <picture class="img-responsive first">

                </source>

                <h4 class="title-article without-separator">
                 <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/13/creative-fashion-sketches-with-food/">

                <small class="post-info">
                 <span class="post-about">

                <h4 class="title-article without-separator">

              <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-photography " id="post-693472">
               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-photography" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/12/vivid-sydney-festival-4k-timelapse/">
                <picture class="img-responsive first">

             <li>
              <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-design " id="post-692221">
               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-design" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/12/coca-cola-bottle-reimagined-by-designers/">
                <picture class="img-responsive first">
                 <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/DavidRockwell-440x285.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">
                 </source>
                 <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/DavidRockwell-320x207.jpg" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">
                 </source>
                 <source data-size="344x222" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/DavidRockwell-344x222.jpg" media="(max-width:1020px)">
                 </source>

              <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-pop-culture " id="post-692263">

              <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-motion loop-video " id="post-693238">

               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-motion" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/10/make-a-child-cry-campaign/">
                <picture class="img-responsive first">

                </picture>

                </picture>
               </a>
               <div class="container-text-loop">

                </picture>
               </a>
               <div class="container-text-loop">

             <li>
              <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-pop-culture " id="post-546895">
               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-pop-culture" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/01/best-of-creative-tables-on-fubiz/">
                <picture class="img-responsive first">
                 <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Best-of-Creative-Table-on-Fubiz_0-440x285.png" media="(min-width:1380px)">

                 </source>
                 <!--[if IE 8 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Best-of-Creative-Table-on-Fubiz_0-440x285.png" alt="Best-of Creative Tables on Fubiz"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->

                 <h4 class="title-article without-separator">
                  <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/12/neon-light-spaces-by-james-turrell/">

                 <small class="post-info">
                  <span class="post-about">

             <li>
              <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-technology " id="post-669351">

                 <h4 class="title-article without-separator">
                  <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/06/26/interactive-sanctuary-installation-connected-to-your-heartbeats/">

        <div class="col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
         <h1 class="title-part white-title">
          iPhone Case Custom
         </h1>
         <div class="info-article">
          <div class="container-info-article">
           <p class="post-categories">
            <a class="waves-effect" href="http://www.fubiz.net/category/design/" style="background-color: rgba(229,203,82, 0.85); border-color: rgb(229,203,82);">
             Design
            </a>
           </p>
           <span class="time">
            <time datetime="2013-03-10T17:44:32+02:00" pubdate="">
             Il y a 2 ans
            </time>
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="single-page" id="single-container" style="border-top-color: rgb(229,203,82);">
     <div class="shadow-box hidden-sm hidden-xs">
     </div>
     <div class="container container-custom" id="content">
      <div class="row">
       <div class="col-lg-9 col-md-8 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 content-single-xs">
        <div class="main-container-single">
         <div class="container-element-scroll-single">
          <div class="left-content-single">
           <div class="share-block">
            <div class="count-total">
             <span class="number clrz_compteur">
              725
             </span>

              shares
             </span>

          <div class="content-single color-design">
           <article class="post loop-full" id="post-313366">
            <div class="post-content" id="post-content">
             <div class="inner-post-content">
              <p>
               Rsultat dune collaboration entre Halfmann Mennickeim Design et lagence Elastique, la socit
               <a href="http://krizzl.com">
                Krizzl
               </a>
               propose une customisation trs crative pour les protections (case) diPhone 4 ou 5. Un concept russi bas sur un cahier  dessin dtachable en tui. A dcouvrir en dtails dans la suite.
              </p>
              <p>
               <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2013/03/10/iphone-case-custom/">
                <img alt="" class="lazy alignnone size-medium wp-image-313384" data-original="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/iPhone-Cover-Custom3-640x426.jpg" height="426" src="" title="" width="640"/>
                <noscript>
                 <img alt="" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-313384" height="426" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/iPhone-Cover-Custom3-640x426.jpg" title="" width="640"/>
                </noscript>
               </a>
              </p>
              <p>
               <span id="more-313366">
               </span>
              </p>
              <p>
               <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2013/03/10/iphone-case-custom/iphone-cover-custom7/" rel="attachment wp-att-313388">
                <img alt="" class="lazy alignnone size-medium wp-image-313388" data-original="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/iPhone-Cover-Custom7-640x640.jpg" height="640" src="" title="iPhone Cover Custom7" width="640"/>
                <noscript>
                 <img alt="" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-313388" height="640" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/iPhone-Cover-Custom7-640x640.jpg" title="iPhone Cover Custom7" width="640"/>
                </noscript>
               </a>
              </p>
              <p>
               <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2013/03/10/iphone-case-custom/iphone-cover-custom6/" rel="attachment wp-att-313387">
                <img alt="" class="lazy alignnone size-medium wp-image-313387" data-original="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/iPhone-Cover-Custom6-640x640.jpg" height="640" src="" title="iPhone Cover Custom6" width="640"/>
                <noscript>
                 <img alt="" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-313387" height="640" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/iPhone-Cover-Custom6-640x640.jpg" title="iPhone Cover Custom6" width="640"/>
                </noscript>
               </a>
              </p>
              <p>
               <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2013/03/10/iphone-case-custom/iphone-cover-custom5/" rel="attachment wp-att-313386">
                <img alt="" class="lazy alignnone size-medium wp-image-313386" data-original="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/iPhone-Cover-Custom5-640x640.jpg" height="640" src="" title="iPhone Cover Custom5" width="640"/>
                <noscript>
                 <img alt="" class="alignnone size-medium wp-image-313386" height="640" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/iPhone-Cover-Custom5-640x640.jpg" title="iPhone Cover Custom5" width="640"/>
                </noscript>
               </a>
              </p>
              <p>
               <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2013/03/10/iphone-case-custom/iphone-cover-custom4/" rel="attachment wp-att-313385">

                </noscript>

            <div class="widget a_widget clrz_mostpopular">

     <div class="row center-content">
      <div class="col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12">
       <div class="container-ad-970x250 gradient-grey-bloc">
        <div class="ad-970x250">
         <div class="content-bloc-advert" id="div-gpt-ad-inc-2">
          <script type="text/javascript">
           var list = jQuery.parseJSON(autoPromos);
var temp_key, keys = [];
for(temp_key in list) {
    if(list.hasOwnProperty(temp_key)) {
        keys.push(temp_key);
    }
}
var socialPromo = list[keys[Math.floor(Math.random() * keys.length)]];
if(!isMobile){
jQuery('#div-gpt-ad-inc-2').html(''+
'&lt;a href="'+socialPromo.url+'" class="autopromo size-970x250" '+((socialPromo.url!='' &amp;&amp; socialPromo.url!='#') ? 'target="_blank"' : '')+'&gt;'+
    '&lt;div class="overlay"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/'+socialPromo.filename+'.png"&gt;'+
    '&lt;/div&gt;'+
    '&lt;div class="background"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/img-1.gif" class="image_1"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/img-2.gif" class="image_2"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/img-3.gif" class="image_3"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/img-4.gif" class="image_4"&gt;'+
    '&lt;/div&gt;'+
'&lt;/a&gt;'+
'').show();
}
                    jQuery('#div-gpt-ad-inc-2').attr('id', 'div-gpt-ad-inc-2-old');
          </script>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>

                 <img alt="E-Glide GT Powerboard" class="img-responsive" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/E-Glide-GT-Powerboard-1-440x285.jpg" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg"/>
                 <!--&lt;![endif]-->
                 <noscript>
                  <img alt="E-Glide GT Powerboard" class="img-responsive" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/E-Glide-GT-Powerboard-1-440x285.jpg"/>
                 </noscript>
                </picture>
               </div>
              </a>
              <div class="container-text-loop">
               <div>

             <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-pop-culture " id="post-634736">
              <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-pop-culture" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/04/15/renault-the-greatest-roles-of-kevin-spacey/">
               <picture class="img-responsive first">
                <source data-size="440x285" media="(min-width:1380px)" srcset="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/renault-kevinspacey-0-440x285.jpg">
                </source>
                <source data-size="320x207" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)" srcset="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/renault-kevinspacey-0-320x207.jpg">
                </source>
                <source data-size="344x222" media="(max-width:1020px)" srcset="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/renault-kevinspacey-0-344x222.jpg">
                </source>
                <!--[if IE 8 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/renault-kevinspacey-0-440x285.jpg" alt="Renault &#8211; The Greatest Roles of Kevin Spacey"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->

                </noscript>
               </picture>
               <div class="hover-img">
                <picture class="img-responsive ">
                 <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/renault-kevinspacey-1-440x285.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">

                </picture>
               </div>
              </a>

  <script>
   fire_clrz_likez_js();
function fire_clrz_likez_js(){
	jQuery('.clrz_likez[rel!=""]').each(function(){

        var el = jQuery(this);

		if(!el.hasClass('clrz_likez_active')){
			el.addClass('clrz_likez_active');
		}else {
			return 0;
		}


	    var cookievalue = readCookie('clrz_likez'+el.attr('rel'));

        if(cookievalue=='1'){
            el.addClass('bookmarked');
            el.find('.txt-bookmark').html('Bookmarked');
        }

	    if(cookievalue == null || cookievalue == '' || el.hasClass('stoplike')){
	        el.addClass('cliquable');
	        if(el.innerHTML != '...')
	            el.data('old_value', el.innerHTML);
            var params = {'post_id':el.attr('rel')};
	        if(el.hasClass('stoplike')){
                params.action = 'remove';
            }
	        el.on('click',function(e){
                var params = {post_id:el.attr('rel')};
	            if(el.hasClass('stoplike')){
                    params.action = 'remove';
	            }
	            jQuery.ajax({
	                method: 'get',
	                url: 'http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/plugins/clrz_likez/likez.php',
	                noCache:true,
                    data:params,
                    beforeSend : function(){
	                    el.addClass('loading');
	                },
                    complete : function(response){

//	                    if(el.hasClass('stoplike')){
//	                        var parentel = el.getParent();
//	                        while(!parentel.hasClass('loop-mini'))
//	                            parentel = parentel.getParent();
//	                        parentel.getParent().destroy();
//	                        if($('nblikeaccount')){
//	                            $('nblikeaccount').set('html', $('nblikeaccount').get('html').toInt()-1);
//	                        }
//	                    }else{
//	                        if(response == '') response = el.data('old_value');
//	                        el.innerHTML = response;
//	                        el.removeEvents('click');
//	                        el.removeClass('//');
//	                    }
                        el.removeClass('loading');
                        el.addClass('bookmarked');
                        el.find('.txt-bookmark').html('Bookmarked');
	                }
	            });
                return false;
	        });
	    }else {
	        el.innerHTML = ''+cookievalue+'';
	    }
	});
}
  </script>
